Class Notepad

    Entries storage is an array

        Add entry in notepad

                 throws java.lang.Exception

      • deleteEntry

        public void deleteEntry(int number)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete entry with entered index
        Parameters:
        number - index of entry to delete
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if notepad hasn't entry with entered index

      • editEntry

        public void editEntry(int number,
                      NotepadEntry entry)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Edit entry in notepad
        Parameters:
        number - index of entry to edit
        entry - new entry to replace old entry
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if notepad hasn't entry with entered index
